Faction.name: Dragon Altar
Faction.Description: Generate special tiles on the battlefield. Heroes on these tiles gain enhancement effects, with Dragon Altar Heroes receiving 300% of the enhancement.

2.effect: 8% Extra DMG, 8 Hybrid DEF, generate 4 special tiles on the field.

4.effect: 12% Extra DMG, 12 Hybrid DEF, generate 6 special tiles on the field.

6.effect: 16% Extra DMG, 16 Hybrid DEF, all tiles on your Chessboard become special tiles.
